name: editor.open_level
description: Open a map/level asset in the editor (loads the world).

name: editor.save_level
description: Save the currently loaded level or a specific level.

map_path.description: Optional map asset path. Omit to save current.

name: editor.new_level
description: Create a new empty level asset.

name: editor.set_editor_camera
description: Set the editor viewport camera transform.

name: editor.get_editor_camera
description: Get the editor viewport camera transform.

name: editor.set_game_view
description: Toggle Game View in editor viewport.

name: editor.focus_selection
description: Focus editor camera on selected actors.

name: selection.get_selected_actors
description: Return selected actors in the editor.

name: actor.rename_label
description: Rename an actor label in the level.

name: actor.duplicate_actor
description: Duplicate an actor in the level.

name: actor.set_folder
description: Set actor folder path in World Outliner.

name: actor.set_tags
description: Replace actor tags with provided list.

name: content.find_assets
description: Search assets by class, path, name pattern or tag.

name: content.rename_asset
description: Rename or move an asset to a new path.

name: content.duplicate_asset
description: Duplicate an asset to a new path.

name: content.delete_assets
description: Delete assets (safe delete with references check).

name: content.fixup_redirectors
description: Fix up redirectors in a content folder.

name: content.sync_browser_to
description: Sync Content Browser to given asset(s).

name: content.set_metadata_tags
description: Set custom metadata tags on an asset.

name: content.list_referencers
description: List assets that reference a given asset.

name: content.list_dependencies
description: List assets that a given asset depends on.

name: content.bulk_move_root
description: Bulk move assets to a new root while preserving relative paths.

name: material.create_instance
description: Create a new Material Instance asset from a parent.

name: material.instance_set_scalar
description: Set scalar parameter on a Material Instance.

name: material.instance_set_vector
description: Set vector (color) parameter on a Material Instance.

name: material.instance_set_texture
description: Set texture parameter on a Material Instance.

name: material.recompile
description: Recompile a material or all materials.

name: shader.flush_cache
description: Flush derived shader cache (forces recompilation next use).

name: shader.set_compile_jobs_limit
description: Set editor shader compile job limit.

name: material.open_editor
description: Open a material or material instance in the editor.

name: material.audit_parameters
description: List all exposed parameters on a material instance (names/types/defaults).

name: texture.import
description: Import an image file as a Texture2D.

name: virtualtexture.enable
description: Enable virtual texturing for a texture.

name: virtualtexture.set_tile_size
description: Configure VT tile size and border.

name: texture.open_editor
description: Open a texture asset in the editor.

name: texture.audit_memory
description: Estimate texture memory cost and streaming behavior.

name: texture.set_lod_bias
description: Set LOD bias (drop top mips) for a texture.

name: staticmesh.generate_lods
description: Generate LODs for a Static Mesh using reduction settings.

name: staticmesh.set_collision
description: Configure collision for a Static Mesh.

name: staticmesh.enable_nanite
description: Enable Nanite on a Static Mesh.

name: staticmesh.set_lightmap
description: Set lightmap UV channel and resolution.

name: staticmesh.merge_actors
description: Merge multiple mesh actors into one new Static Mesh asset.

name: staticmesh.audit
description: Audit mesh stats (tris, verts, LODs, Nanite, collision).

name: staticmesh.set_section_material
description: Assign material to a specific mesh section.

name: skeleton.create_from_mesh
description: Create a new Skeleton asset from a Skeletal Mesh.

name: animation.set_root_motion
description: Configure root motion extraction on an AnimSequence.

name: animation.compress
description: Run animation compression on an AnimSequence.

name: animation.open_editor
description: Open an animation asset in editor.

name: skeletalmesh.audit
description: Audit skeletal mesh (bones, LODs, skin weights, physics asset).

name: niagara.add_emitter_to_system
description: Add an emitter to a Niagara System.

name: niagara.set_user_param_default
description: Set a user parameter default on a Niagara System.

name: niagara.add_renderer
description: Add a renderer to an emitter.

name: niagara.set_sim_target
description: Set simulation target for an emitter (CPU/GPU).

name: niagara.compile_asset
description: Compile Niagara scripts for a system or emitter.

name: niagara.spawn_in_level
description: Spawn a Niagara system component in the current level.

name: niagara.audit
description: Audit Niagara asset for compile errors and missing dependencies.

name: sequencer.add_actor_binding
description: Add an actor binding to a Level Sequence.

name: sequencer.add_transform_track
description: Add a transform track for a bound actor.

name: sequencer.add_camera_cut_track
description: Add camera cut track and set active camera binding.

name: sequencer.add_key
description: Add a keyframe to a track channel.

name: sequencer.open_editor
description: Open a Level Sequence in Sequencer.

name: sequencer.render_movie_queue
description: Render a Level Sequence via Movie Render Queue.

name: movierender.create_preset
description: Create a Movie Render Pipeline preset asset.

name: sequencer.audit
description: Audit a sequence for missing bindings and invalid tracks.

name: movierender.set_console_vars
description: Set console vars for render preset.

name: worldpartition.convert_level
description: Convert a level to World Partition.

name: worldpartition.build_hlods
description: Build HLODs for a World Partition map.

name: datalayers.assign_actors
description: Assign actors to a Data Layer.

name: datalayers.set_state
description: Set Data Layer state in editor.

name: datalayers.remove_actors
description: Remove actors from a Data Layer.

name: pcg.add_component
description: Add a PCG Component to an actor and assign a graph.

name: pcg.set_seed
description: Set seed on a PCG component.

name: pcg.generate
description: Trigger PCG generation on a component.

name: pcg.graph_add_mesh_spawner
description: Add a Static Mesh Spawner node to a PCG graph.

name: pcg.graph_add_surface_sampler
description: Add a Surface Sampler node to a PCG graph.

name: pcg.audit
description: Audit PCG graph for missing references/compile issues.

name: pcg.bake_output
description: Bake generated PCG output to instances/actors.

name: nav.build_navmesh
description: Build navigation data for current world.

name: nav.project_point
description: Project a point to the navmesh.

name: nav.find_path
description: Find a navigation path between two points.

name: ai.spawn_controller
description: Spawn an AIController and possess a pawn.

name: ai.run_behavior_tree
description: Run a Behavior Tree on an AIController.

name: umg.add_widget_node
description: Add a widget to a Widget Blueprint tree.

name: umg.bind_property
description: Bind a widget property to a function.

name: umg.audit
description: Audit widget blueprint for broken bindings.

name: hud.add_to_viewport
description: Add a widget class to viewport (runtime).

name: hud.remove_from_viewport
description: Remove a widget instance from viewport.

name: ui.set_input_mode
description: Set player input mode and cursor visibility.

name: datatable.upsert_row
description: Add or update a DataTable row.

name: package.project
description: Package the project for a platform.

name: build.scan_log_errors
description: Scan build/cook logs for common errors.

name: profiling.audit_map
description: Run a lightweight map perf audit.

name: sourcecontrol.connect
description: Connect to a source control provider.

name: sourcecontrol.status
description: Get source control status for paths.

name: audio.apply_sound_mix
description: Apply a Sound Mix at runtime.

name: audio.clear_sound_mix
description: Clear a Sound Mix at runtime.

name: audio.audit_assets
description: Audit audio assets for missing refs and loudness hints.

name: net.audit_replication
description: Audit actors replication settings in current world.

name: net.dump_net_graph
description: Dump network graph stats (net pkt, bunches).

name: render.capture_scene_to_render_target
description: Capture scene to a render target from a camera.

name: render.audit_gpu_budget
description: Estimate GPU budget risk (nanite, shadows, lumen, virtual textures).

name: landscape.create
description: Create a Landscape actor in the level.

name: foliage.add_type
description: Add a foliage type to foliage tool.

name: foliage.paint
description: Procedurally paint foliage within a volume (editor).

name: foliage.clear_in_volume
description: Remove foliage instances inside a volume.

name: foliage.audit_instances
description: Audit foliage instance counts and overdraw risk.

name: landscape.audit
description: Audit landscape components, LODs, and memory.

name: physics.set_ragdoll
description: Enable ragdoll on a skeletal mesh component.

name: physics.apply_impulse
description: Apply impulse to an actor or component.

name: physics.apply_force
description: Apply force to an actor or component.

name: physics.set_linear_damping
description: Set linear damping on primitive component.

name: physics.set_angular_damping
description: Set angular damping on primitive component.

name: physics.set_constraint_profile
description: Set physics constraint profile on a constraint component.

name: chaos.audit_simulation
description: Audit Chaos settings (solver, sleep thresholds) for stability.
